title: 32 Glen, Large 1 bed/1bath Top Floor Flat, Remodeled
posting_body: Please be advised that unauthorized Craigslist ads exist posing as The Lapham Company.
If you have any concerns about the  legitimacy of our ads please contact us immediately at
Photos are of a representative apartment in the building.
The currently available unit may differ from the unit pictured above.
32 Glen, Large 1 bed/1bath Top Floor Flat, Remodeled, $2,450.00
New Special Offer: $1,500 Cash Bonus At Move In!
Total credit applied in equal installments over the first 3 months Please contact leasing agent for more details.
For an Appointment to View, please contact: Mark mobile:
Cats Allowed, Small Dogs ok (Extra deposit/fees may be required)
32 Glen, Walk to Everything, Vintage Building
Newly updated 1 Bed/ 1 Bath top level flat
Great light with lots of windows
Tiled bathroom with rainfall shower head
Cross streets are Glen Ave. and Piedmont Ave.
Walk to shops, dining, and theater.
Walk to Piedmont Ave. fabulous restaurants, coffee shops, bars, shops, and theater!
Quick access to major highways 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13
Minutes to San Francisco, Berkeley, Hayward, Walnut Creek, and San Leandro
Bus stops for AC Transit nearby on Piedmont Ave. and Broadway
Walk to Casual Carpool location and the intersection of Oakland Ave. and Monte Vista Ave.
Office Hours are 9-5pm Closed for Lunch 12-1pm
